title: Microsoft outage: RBI assessment shows 10 banks, NBFCs experienced 'minor' disruptions
description: The Reserve Bank of India (RBI) has assessed the impact of a Microsoft Services outage on its regulated entities, particularly in the Indian financial sector. The bank found that around 10 banks and non-banking financial companies experienced minor disruptions, which have either been resolved or are currently being addressed.
